headline: Novo Nordisk A/S (NVO): A Bull Case Theory

Novo Nordisk A/S (NYSE:NVO)’s share was trading at $85.73 as of Dec 30th. NVO’s trailing and forward P/E were 28.92 and 21.98 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Novo Nordisk’s […]
